Buddy SCHEDULING EXAM SCHEDULE EXAM BUTTON SET SCHEDULE SHOW SCHEDULE G DRIVE https://gogreenmca.page.link/drive TIMETABLE Powered by © BossCorp™ Hey Buddy ! BossCorp™ Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Home Time Table About Contact Us \"For the students, By the students.\" Buddy was created by Mohammed Shabeer and Suraj Suresh of Integrated MCA 2016 of Amrita School of Arts and Sciences, Kochi as part of their Minor Project during the academic year 2018 - 2019. The main feature of the application is to remotely add the examination timetable to the user\'s Google Calendar and thereby generating reminders about the exam. The application will display details of important events such as project and assignment submissions, test papers e.t.c and other announcements as notifications provided, the device need to be connected to the internet.
Contact Us at: incorporatedboss@gmail.com Navigation header Exit
